entry.em: ..WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT LATE TONIGHT
entry.data: ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM SUNDAY TO 6 AM CST MONDAY

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SLEET AND FREEZING RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SLEET ACCUMULATION
ICE ACCUMULATION OF UP TO A TENTH OF AN INCH
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

SLEET
FREEZING RAIN
PRECIPITATION MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES
LIGHT SLEET ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

SNOW SHOWERS AND FREEZING RAIN
NEW LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
